name: Mac Studio & Studio Display
description:
Update March 15 2022: Added Mac Pro


All images have the background removed so you can freely move them around and not worry about cropping and white backgrounds getting in your way.


The Studio Display has been scaled so that the screen is exactly 5K resolution. (2560x1440 @2x) All other devices have been scaled accordingly.


You can easily hide and show your favorite Mac or hide them all together to focus on the display and your website.
